reviews.review:
Tried ranked, got instantly HSed with the AK, tried something more "casual" like the community servers, got instantly HSed with the AK.

If you have no other life than CS and live in your parents basement, you will enjoy this game. 

Other people that might have a life and want to have some casual fun, stay away from this game.

CSS was way more fun.
El MM está roto, pero lo demas BRUTAL.

If only VAC worked better, because for new starters this is not a game I can easily recommend. You need to build up your Trust Factor to have a better chance of not versing cheaters, which takes time and/or money.
The game itself is amazing and otherwise the perfect classic shooter. Recommended, but only if you're willing to accept that you will encounter cheaters from time to time.

很不错的游戏，是国内目前少有的能够做到公平竞技的游戏。不像什么穿越什么的，没有属性，拼的是操作和意识。可能刚开始玩的时候会比较难，两级分化其实也不是很严重，多玩一玩，熟练了之后就可以了。新手建议多去休闲和人机试炼里练枪。熟练了之后再考虑买优先账户

I love this game. It is great for the competitive gamer. If you are not of that genre of gamer, than DO NOT BUY PRIME, upon purchase you are forced into lobbies where everyone is a try hard and has a knife over a grand in value. Other than that, good game.
